subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kevin Ware, a sophomore reserve guard, broke his lower right leg in the first half of Louisville’s victory over Duke. The Cardinals used Ware’s injury as a rallying point.
snippet: Kevin Ware, a sophomore reserve guard, broke his lower right leg in the first half of Louisville’s victory over Duke. The Cardinals used Ware’s injury as a rallying point.
